title: VERCH RESEARCH
subtitle: Q1 2026 Market Outlook

executiveSummary.bitcoin: The 200WMA thesis suggests cycle bottom target of ~$40,000. Historical precedent supports this level, but institutional ETF inflows and corporate treasury adoption may alter dynamics. 55% probability of testing $40K zone.
executiveSummary.commodities: Gold has surged to ~$5,000/oz on structural inflation hedges and central bank buying. Silver at ~$65 reflects industrial demand. Overweight positioning maintained.
executiveSummary.equities: Markets elevated with AI-driven valuations. Rate cut expectations key. Neutral stance with quality factor preference.

sections.title: Bitcoin Cycle Analysis
sections.content:
The 200-week moving average (200WMA) has historically marked cycle lows:

• 2015 bottom: $200 (200WMA ~$400)
• 2018 bottom: $3,200 (200WMA ~$2,800)
• 2022 bottom: $15,500 (200WMA ~$22,000)

Current 200WMA sits at ~$42,000. This represents our base case target.

sections.title: Strategic Positioning
sections.content:
• Core: 60% Bitcoin, 20% Gold, 10% Cash
• Satellite: 5% Silver, 5% Selected tech
• Risk management: Stop-loss at -15%
